DataElement.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction DIEP Flap Performed Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record information related to breast reconstruction (surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy) using DIEP flap reconstruction (a type of breast reconstruction in which blood vessels and the skin and fat connected to them are removed from the lower abdomen and used for reconstruction) performed (executed and carried through to completion).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction DIEP Flap Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to breast reconstruction (surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy) using DIEP flap reconstruction (a type of breast reconstruction in which blood vessels and the skin and fat connected to them are removed from the lower abdomen and used for reconstruction) performed (executed and carried through to completion).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy.:A type of breast reconstruction in which blood vessels called deep inferior epigastric perforators (DIEP), and the skin and fat connected to them are removed from the lower abdomen and used for reconstruction. Muscle is left in place.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: A type of breast reconstruction in which blood vessels called deep inferior epigastric perforators (DIEP), and the skin and fat connected to them are removed from the lower abdomen and used for reconstruction. Muscle is left in place.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
